release_notes.en-US:
Added blocSonic connector
Added eMusic connector
Added LetsLoop connector
Added Mideast Tunes connector
Added Mixblast connector
Added Radiooooo.com connector
Added Sound Session connector
Added Streamsquid connector
Added Vagalume.FM connector
Added feature to open now playing tab by clicking on now playing notification
Added support for Loud.zone
Added support for more Amazon websites
Added tooltips to input fields of the info popup
Improved VK connector
Updated translations
Fixed Deezer connector
Fixed Focus@Will connector
Fixed metadata filter
Fixed an issue when the extension didn't update browser action context menu
